## Description {#details}

CRTP base class providing obvious overloads for the core <code><a href="#a3bfc5b8ce6ce70645e6f4662af9eef50">Allocate()</a></code> methods of LLVM-style allocators.

This base class both documents the full public interface exposed by all LLVM-style allocators, and redirects all of the overloads to a single core set of methods which the derived class must define.

Definition at line 40 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/allocatorbase-h">AllocatorBase.h</a>.

Allocate <em>Size</em> bytes of <em>Alignment</em> aligned memory.

This method must be implemented by <code>DerivedT</code>.
